EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_PaloAltoOfficeOpening_Q214.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed to attend Pivotal presents Fireside with Greylock (May 29)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
REGISTRATION CONFIRMATION Pivotal presents Fireside Chat with Greylock YOUR REGISTRATION IS CONFIRMED Hello {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Thank you for registering for Pivotal presents Fireside Chat with Greylock. Please see event details below:
Date: Thursday, May 29, 2014
Time: 6 p.m. - 9 p.m. PDT
Fireside chat starts at 7 p.m.
Location: Pivotal Office, 3495 Deer Creek Rd, Palo Alto, CA
Panel Discussion:
- Scott Yara, President and Head of Products (Pivotal), Founder (Greenplum) - Jerry Chen, Partner (Greylock Partners) - Alex Williams, Founder (The New Stack), (moderator)
Should you have any questions or would like more information, please email jshackleford@pivotallabs.com <mailto:jshackleford@pivotallabs.com>. See you on Thursday, May 29!
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
